design_philosophy.archetype: Fusion of Jewel Luxury & Performance Pro
core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Finance Precision with Cyberpunk Aesthetics
Density is Beauty: High-density grids for data, breathing room for narrative
Darkness with Depth: No flat blacks; use texture, noise, and deep blues

usage.h1: text-5xl md:text-7xl font-black tracking-tighter leading-none uppercase

typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Chivo:wght@300;400;700;900&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;700&family=Manrope:wght@300;400;600;800&display=swap');

gradients.text_gradient: bg-clip-text text-transparent bg-gradient-to-r from-white via-slate-200 to-slate-400

texture.noise: Use a fixed noise overlay with opacity-5 pointer-events-none z-50 mix-blend-overlay

grid_system.dashboard: Bento Grid Mode B: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4

cards.style: Flat, sharp or minimal rounded-md. No heavy shadows. 1px border.

buttons.primary: bg-electric-indigo text-white font-bold tracking-wide px-8 py-3 rounded-sm hover:bg-electric-indigo/90 hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(99,102,241,0.4)] transition-all

charts.style: Minimalist. Hide grid lines or make them extremely subtle (opacity 0.05). Use custom tooltips with glassmorphism.

inputs.style: bg-gunmetal border-white/10 focus:border-electric-indigo focus:ring-1 focus:ring-electric-indigo/50 text-white placeholder:text-white/20

hero_background.usage: Hero section background with heavy overlay (bg-black/80)

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid deep colors + noise.
DO NOT use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Chivo'.
DO NOT center text by default. Left align for strength.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (APCA standards).
Animations must be 'spring' based (framer-motion) or CSS transitions, never linear.
For 3D effects, use subtle CSS perspective or Recharts animations. Do not over-engineer with Three.js unless necessary for a specific 'wow' moment.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a high-performance Portfolio Optimizer. The UI must feel like a professional tool, not a toy. Prioritize data density and clarity. Use the 'Bento Grid' layout for the dashboard. Implement the 'Model Training' view as a high-tech console with progress bars and live metrics. Use the provided image URLs for the landing page.
